posts.post_content:
I'm looking for an unopened 1909-19 era Sweet Caporal and/or Piedmont pack.  It DOES NOT have to be a specific T206 pack with a card, just close in terms of the period. Would prefer one encapsulated.

I'd be interested in buying or have many SGC/JSA signed T206s that I could make available in trade.
I'm still looking for one of these

there is on on ebay  for 3000. as a side note, the guy bought it for 800. i did some research on it a while ago. im looking for one with a card in it so it does not fit my requirements.

kevin

I have an "Authentic - Unopened 1909-19" Sweet Caporal Tobacco Pack GAI "8"  If interested send me your email and I will forward a scan.

Hank
[url]henryjlevy@yahoo.com[/url]

[quote name="thehoodedcoder" post=1083690]there is on on ebay  for 3000. as a side note, the guy bought it for 800. 

kevin[/QUOTE]

He bought it at Huggins and Scott, I was the under bidder.  I emailed him when I saw it listed that he wouldn't get that high of a price.  He said that he would take close to what he paid for it, maybe his situation has changed though.
I'm still in the market for one of these... please PM me if you have one.
I have this sealed one. Very similar but not the correct factory number and does have an overprint but it looks like 1922 to me....lmk if interested...

[quote name="Leon" post=1090068]I have this sealed one. Very similar but not the correct factory number and does have an overprint but it looks like 1922 to me....lmk if interested...[/QUOTE]

Thanks leon,  I'm less concerned about the factory but the overstamp date is a problem. I really want something in the right period.

[quote name="cozmokramer" post=1090287]Thanks leon,  I'm less concerned about the factory but the overstamp date is a problem. I really want something in the right period.[/QUOTE]

No worries Eric. The pack is correct but it is 10 yrs later....Someone else expressed an interest so I will offer it to them...thanks
that guy on ebay sold his.... someone paid alot for it... I think its a very cool piece though.
